title: Refining your search
body: ## Refining your search If you're not getting the results you want from the search page, whether too few or too many, there are a number of parameters you can change to refine your search and improve the results. Tap the funnel icon in the top right corner of the page and it will reveal search form. ![Analysis search form](/gin-data/images/1527772574406-analysis-form.png) ### Max buy % difference ### Max sell % difference ### Min profit % ### Min no. of exchanges ### Currency ### Buy only at... ### Sell only at... ### Order by... ### Sort direction ### Max no. of results
